name: Portalcade
description:
PortalCade - A bad remake of portal, in the mobile/web game engine Fancade.

Sorry about the having to click 2 play buttons, i have no idea what im doing with itch.io

CONTROLS

PC - Arrow keys to move, left click above the jump/portal buttons to look around, hold right click and left click when looking at a cube or radio to pick it up, stop holding to drop it, z, x, or space to use jump/portal buttons.

Mobile - Swipe on the joystick to move, swipe above jump/portal buttons to look around, 2 fingers hold to pick up a cube or radio, let go to drop,  up arrow to jump, left circle button for blue portal, right circle button for orange portal.

Bugs roam free in this game, be careful.

ALSO, PORTALS ARE SHOT SLIGHTLY ABOVE THE CROSSHAIR AT LONG RANGE, AIM CAREFULLY

Other Fancade games - https://sites.google.com/view/codiistudios/home

2
